CustomField.description: Indicates whether the company address has been validated against the addresses in the external tax calculation service.
CustomField.formula: NOT ( ISBLANK(fferpcore__Street__c) && ISBLANK(fferpcore__City__c) && ISBLANK(fferpcore__State__c) && ISBLANK(fferpcore__Zip__c) && ISBLANK(fferpcore__Country__c) ) && ( fferpcore__Street__c = fferpcore__ValidatedStreet__c ) && ( fferpcore__City__c = fferpcore__ValidatedCity__c ) && ( fferpcore__State__c = fferpcore__ValidatedState__c ) && ( fferpcore__Zip__c = fferpcore__ValidatedZip__c ) && ( fferpcore__Country__c = fferpcore__ValidatedCountry__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the company address has been validated against the addresses in the external tax calculation service.
CustomField.label: Address Validated
